properties.name: captcha.hostname
properties.description: Host name of the server hosting the Captcha service

properties.name: captcha.secret
properties.description: Secret to send to the Captcha service

properties.name: captcha.verify-url
properties.description: URL of the service of verification

properties.name: robert.server.controller-path-prefix
properties.description: Path prefix of the Robert Server controllers

properties.name: robert.crypto.hostname
properties.description: Host name of the Robert Crypto server

properties.name: robert.crypto.port
properties.description: Port to use when exchanging with the Robert Crypto server

properties.name: submissionCode.server.hostname
properties.description: Host name of the Submission Code server

properties.name: submissionCode.server.port
properties.description: Port to use when exchanging with the Submission Code server

properties.name: submissionCode.server.verify-path
properties.description: Path of the verify REST service of the Submission Code server
